short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmarks Album. Add comments to yours bookmarks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- You can add comments to your bookmarks so to keep more information about the pages you save.
- You can view, filter and update your comments in an options page.
- You can download your bookmarks and comments in HTML format (to be improved).
